items.description:
Hey Folks,

Sorry for missing the newsletter last week, but hoping you had a productive week, and that means this week is overflowing with great articles and links for you to enjoy.

Also, in just a few hours from now XamExpertDay2021 is streaming live so make sure you join in on the fun (no registration necessary).

Take care, and I'll see you at XamExpertDay ;-)

❤

Kym
items.description_markdown:
Hey Folks,

Sorry for missing the newsletter last week, but hoping you had a productive week, and that means this week is overflowing with great articles and links for you to enjoy.

Also, in just a few hours from now [XamExpertDay2021](https://xamexpertday.com/) is streaming live so make sure you join in on the fun (no registration necessary).

Take care, and I'll see you at XamExpertDay ;-)

❤

Kym

items.title: Xamarin support ends in 2022 on Bitrise
items.description:
At the end of January, 2022 Bitrise will remove Xamarin from its officially supported platforms and with that also remove all VS4 Mac stacks. :(

Xamarin support ends in 2022 on Bitrise by Bitrise
items.description_markdown:
At the end of January, 2022 Bitrise will remove Xamarin from its officially supported platforms and with that also remove all VS4 Mac stacks.   :(

[**Xamarin support ends in 2022 on Bitrise**](https://blog.bitrise.io/post/xamarin-support-ends-in-2022-on-bitrise) by [Bitrise](https://blog.bitrise.io/)

items.title: Opening A PDF in Xamarin Forms - Part 1
items.description:
This article shows you how to open and preview PDF files in Xamarin Forms. It covers creating the custom Xamarin.iOS control from scratch, including a custom thumb nail.

Opening A PDF in Xamarin Forms (Part1: Xamarin.iOS) by Damien Doumer
items.description_markdown:
This article shows you how to open and preview PDF files in Xamarin Forms. It covers creating the custom Xamarin.iOS control from scratch, including a custom thumb nail.

[**Opening A PDF in Xamarin Forms (Part1: Xamarin.iOS)**](https://doumer.me/opening-a-pdf-in-xamarin-forms-part1-xamarin-ios/) by [Damien Doumer](https://twitter.com/damien_doumer)

embedded_links.title: **Opening A PDF in Xamarin Forms (Part1: Xamarin.iOS)**

items.title: Improving performance App using compiled bindings in Xamarin Forms
items.description:
Compiled Binding help us to improve performance by resolving binding expressions at compile-time rather than runtime and integrating the IntelliSense, that’s why they are resolved faster than classic bindings.

Improving performance App using compiled bindings in Xamarin Forms by Leomaris Reyes
items.description_markdown:
Compiled Binding help us to improve performance by resolving binding expressions at compile-time rather than runtime and integrating the IntelliSense, that’s why they are resolved faster than classic bindings.

[**Improving performance App using compiled bindings in Xamarin Forms**](https://askxammy.com/improving-performance-app-using-compiled-bindings/) by [Leomaris Reyes](https://twitter.com/leomarisreyes11)

embedded_links.title: **Improving performance App using compiled bindings in Xamarin Forms**

items.title: Tips and Ticks when creating a Custom Control in Xamarin Forms. Part. 1
items.description:
Creating a custom control is a common thing to do when developing a Xamarin Forms application. In many cases, the main purpose of creating one is to have a reusable control that we can use across all our application. In this blog post, Charlin covers some tips and tricks for creating them.

Tips and Ticks when creating a Custom Control in Xamarin Forms. Part. 1 - XamGirl by Charlin Agramonte
items.description_markdown:
Creating a custom control is a common thing to do when developing a Xamarin Forms application. In many cases, the main purpose of creating one is to have a reusable control that we can use across all our application. In this blog post, Charlin covers some tips and tricks for creating them.

[**Tips and Ticks when creating a Custom Control in Xamarin Forms. Part. 1 - XamGirl**](https://xamgirl.com/tips-and-ticks-when-creating-a-custom-control-in-xamarin-forms-part-1/) by [Charlin Agramonte](https://twitter.com/chard003)

embedded_links.title: **Tips and Ticks when creating a Custom Control in Xamarin Forms. Part. 1 - XamGirl**

items.description:

items.title: Share Images and Videos with Essentials Share in Xamarin.Forms
items.description:
With the Essentials Share APIs you can easily share text, images, videos or any file from your Xamarin.Forms application to any other installed application. Think of WhatsApp, Instagram, TikTok, etc. In this video I will show you how to leverage the Xamarin.Essentials Share API to implement sharing like this.

Share Images and Videos with Essentials Share in Xamarin.Forms by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
With the Essentials Share APIs you can easily share text, images, videos or any file from your Xamarin.Forms application to any other installed application. Think of WhatsApp, Instagram, TikTok, etc. In this video I will show you how to leverage the Xamarin.Essentials Share API to implement sharing like this.

[**Share Images and Videos with Essentials Share in Xamarin.Forms**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sUxzoSl4SUw) by [Gerald Versluis](https://blog.verslu.is/author/admin/)

embedded_links.title: **Share Images and Videos with Essentials Share in Xamarin.Forms**

items.title: Highlight New App Features to Your Users with Xamarin.Essentials VersionTracking
items.description:
Maybe you need to do a database migration or want to show your users a screen to highlight new features in this app version, you can to that with Essentials VersionTracking! In this video I will show you how to use the Xamarin.Essentials VersionTracking APIs to show app version numbers and make decisions based on that information.

Highlight New App Features to Your Users with Xamarin.Essentials VersionTracking by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Maybe you need to do a database migration or want to show your users a screen to highlight new features in this app version, you can to that with Essentials VersionTracking! In this video I will show you how to use the Xamarin.Essentials VersionTracking APIs to show app version numbers and make decisions based on that information.

[**Highlight New App Features to Your Users with Xamarin.Essentials VersionTracking**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-2JlbepO_Mc) by [Gerald Versluis](https://blog.verslu.is/author/admin/)

embedded_links.title: **Highlight New App Features to Your Users with Xamarin.Essentials VersionTracking**

items.title: Breaking .NET MAUI News!!! And the Preview 8 Updates
items.description:
Gerald covers some important breaking .NET MAUI news! Before we talk about the new things in preview 8, we first need to talk about the delay of .NET MAUI GA and what that means for Xamarin.Forms. And also: a XAML Previewer, XAML Hot Reload and .NET Hot Reload in Visual Studio 2022. All in this video!

Breaking .NET MAUI News!1!! And the Preview 8 Updates by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Gerald covers some important breaking .NET MAUI news! Before we talk about the new things in preview 8, we first need to talk about the delay of .NET MAUI GA and what that means for Xamarin.Forms. And also: a XAML Previewer, XAML Hot Reload and .NET Hot Reload in Visual Studio 2022. All in this video!

[**Breaking .NET MAUI News!1!! And the Preview 8 Updates**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iu2KA3dAcM8) by [Gerald Versluis](https://blog.verslu.is/author/admin/)

embedded_links.title: **Breaking .NET MAUI News!1!! And the Preview 8 Updates**

items.title: .NET MAUI Preview 8 Hands-on - True Single Project, Hot Reload Everywhere, & 1 Click Install
items.description:
.NET MAUI Preview 8 is here wish so many goodies including the new 1 click install with Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4, XAML & C# Hot Reload everywhere, a new XAML Live Preview, and iOS Hot Restart so you can deploy to an iOS from Windows. I break it all down for you!

.NET MAUI Preview 8 Hands-on - True Single Project, Hot Reload Everywhere, & 1 Click Install by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
.NET MAUI Preview 8 is here wish so many goodies including the new 1 click install with Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4, XAML & C# Hot Reload everywhere, a new XAML Live Preview, and iOS Hot Restart so you can deploy to an iOS from Windows. I break it all down for you!

[**.NET MAUI Preview 8 Hands-on - True Single Project, Hot Reload Everywhere, & 1 Click Install**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q0qLiBmbOTI) by [James Montemagno](https://channel9.msdn.com/niners/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI Preview 8 Hands-on - True Single Project, Hot Reload Everywhere, & 1 Click Install**

items.title: .NET MAUI Preview 8 - Tips & Tricks | Windows Setup, MVVM Hot Reload, and Dependency Injection
items.description:
You had questions from my last video and I have answers and what better way then with another video! I break down all the things you need to know for Windows setup and deployment, MVVM hot reload of the view model, and how to use those fancy new dependency injection in .NET MAUI.

.NET MAUI Preview 8 - Tips & Tricks | Windows Setup, MVVM Hot Reload, and Dependency Injection by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
You had questions from my last video and I have answers and what better way then with another video! I break down all the things you need to know for Windows setup and deployment, MVVM hot reload of the view model, and how to use those fancy new dependency injection in .NET MAUI.

[**.NET MAUI Preview 8 - Tips & Tricks | Windows Setup, MVVM Hot Reload, and Dependency Injection**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BmI0QnwKTsQ) by [James Montemagno](https://channel9.msdn.com/niners/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI Preview 8 - Tips & Tricks | Windows Setup, MVVM Hot Reload, and Dependency Injection**
